title: Linux: Mount Remote Directories With SSHFS
author: Jack Wallen
description: SSHFS mounts remote directories to a local machine using secure encryption, with a connection that is far more secure than your standard FTP.
cntitle: Linux：使用 SSHFS 挂载远程目录
cndescription: SSHFS 使用安全加密将远程目录挂载到本地机器，连接比标准 FTP 安全得多。
